## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an "x" -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have removed any console.logs and debugging code

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly
- [ ] I have added/updated JSDoc comments for new functions
- [ ] I have updated the README if necessary
- [ ] I have updated the CHANGELOG if necessary

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested on multiple browsers (if UI changes)
- [ ] I have tested on mobile devices (if applicable)

### Dependencies
- [ ] I have checked that my changes don't introduce new dependencies unnecessarily
- [ ] If I added dependencies, I've justified them in this PR

### Security
- [ ] My changes don't introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I haven't exposed any sensitive data (API keys, credentials, etc.)
- [ ] I've checked that Firestore security rules are still appropriate
